text: Omwesi kwa Ramadhani okwa Ikurani yeshilibwamwo okhuba obulunjifu khu bandu, nende ebifune bili habulafu okhurula khubulunjifu nende obwawukhasio (hakari wo bwatoto nende obubeyi.) Kho ulia mwinywe womwesi oko kumunyoola afunge, Ne uli omulwale nohomba uli khuluchendo abalilile tsinyanga tsindi, Nyasaye abenyelanga obwangu, ne shabenyelanga obusiro tawe, Ne mumale tsinyanga tsibalwa etso ne mwitsomie Nyasaye khu kayabalunjilisia, muba murio khomwanyoola okhupa orio
